meanings.definition: A sandwich made with thinly sliced beefsteak and melted cheese, typically served on a hoagie roll.
meanings.sent1: I ordered two cheesesteaks for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The food truck sells delicious cheesesteaks.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, everyone fought over the last cheesesteak.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as comforting as a warm cheesesteak on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of sizzling cheesesteaks filled the air.

meanings.definition: To prepare or consume a cheesesteak sandwich.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys cheesesteaks with extra cheese.
meanings.sent3: He cheesesteaks quickly before the game.
meanings.sent4: The chef expertly cheesesteaks for the hungry customers.
meanings.sent5: They always cheesesteaks together on Fridays.
